channel.title: Anyone wanna try to build something more unique?
channel.description:
I'm open to suggestions on ideas for bases, I want to build something that has the classic Runescape feel but is unique. I'd prefer something old-school similar to 07 Runescape graphics wise. However, open to different ideas.
PM me, or leave below your Skype.

item.title: Anyone wanna try to build something more unique?
item.dc:creator: @furyking50 furyking50
item.description:
@furyking50 wrote:

Take another game then make a remake of it with runescape-
like they said club penguin npc’s try and do something like it? pets, houses, card battling etc, jobs etc.
or a game like LoL you can try and make it so your play as a character.

Read full topic
item.source: Anyone wanna try to build something more unique?
